de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.configuration.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigurationFG

    public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents a configuration and provides operations for the configuration process.

        public Configuration(Configuration configuration,
                     IFeatureModel featureModel)
        Copy constructor. Copies the status of a given configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration -
        featureModel - the underlying feature model. The model can be different from the old configuration.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks that all manual and automatic selections are valid.
        Abstract features will not be ignored.
        Returns:
        true if the current selection is a valid configuration

      • isValidNoHidden

        public boolean isValidNoHidden()
        Ignores hidden features. Use this, when propgate is disabled (hidden features are not updated).

      • leadToValidConfiguration

        public void makeManual(boolean discardDeselected)
        Turns all automatic into manual values
        Parameters:
        discardDeselected - if true all automatic deselected features get undefined instead of manual deselected

      • number

        public long number()
        Convenience method, fully equivalent to number(250, false).
        Returns:
        number of possible solutions
        See Also:
        number(boolean), number(long, boolean)

      • number

        public long number(boolean includeHiddenFeatures)
        Convenience method, fully equivalent to number(250, includeHiddenFeatures).
        Parameters:
        includeHiddenFeatures - true if hidden feature should be considered, false otherwise
        Returns:
        number of possible solutions
        See Also:
        number(), number(long, boolean)

      • number

        public long number(long timeout,
                   boolean includeHiddenFeatures)
        Counts the number of possible solutions.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds.
        includeHiddenFeatures - true if hidden feature should be considered, false otherwise
        Returns:
        a positive value equal to the number of solutions (if the method terminated in time)
        or a negative value (if a timeout occured) that indicates that there are more solutions than the absolute value

                                                                      boolean selection)
                                                               throws org.sat4j.specs.TimeoutException
